casebody.data:
First Department,

January, 1959

(January 7, 1959) Charles G. Fuqua et al., Doing Business under the Name of Universal Attractions, v. Ivory D. Watson et al.

Motion to dismiss appeal denied and the defendant-respondent’s time to serve his points is extended to January 17, 1959. Concur — Botein, P. J., M. M. Frank, Valente, McNally and Bergan, JJ.
